original_title: Amanda Lear: Lyra '82 Live at Bratislava
overview: Live concert performed by rock/disco singer Amanda Lear in Bratislava, Slovakia in 1982.  Features performances of Rockin' Rollin' (I Hear You Naggin'), Take a Walk on the Wild Side / Follow Me, I am a Photograph, Fever, Just a Gigolo, Tomorrow / I Need a Man, Hollywood Flashback, Egal, Berlin Lady and Trouble.
title: Amanda Lear: Lyra '82 Live at Bratislava
